summary: DT: THE CONTACT STATES THERE IS NHTSA RECALL 05V388000 CONCERNING THE VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL DEACTIVATION SWITCH . THE PART NEEDED TO REPAIR HIS VEHICLE IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THE  LOCAL DEALERSHIP. THE CONTACT  SPOKE TO  MANUFACTURER, WHO  CONFIRMED  THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.  *AK
